name: AltSwitch
description: First-of-its-kind Universal Rewards Protocol empowering its community with a cyclical economic model from a decentralized tax system. Powered by its ecosystem of NFTs, DAO, Play-To-Earn, Hardware Wallet and AltApps & Services. Building commerce of the largest modern scale on an Alternate Universe (Metaverse).The mother of all soon to be built Apps & Services for Web 3.0 that will generate revenue of rewards back to its community
